Hydras/Perceptor/Darkhawk


Hydras was furious and yelled by the "I WANT TH=
OSE INTRUDERS AND IF ONE OF THEM RUNS YOU WIL SUFFER MY WRATh!!!!"

The int=
ernal defences turn on and Opened fire against RAttrap, a wounded but still=
 fuctional Darkhawk  kicked badly Tucson and after a hard beating he attemp=
ed to tied ightly tied his arms and legs. 

Perceptor looking to Rodimus sa=
id "Go and learn what Zarak is into... after that Report to hdyras what is =
happening as well as our own plans, I need to do a trip and find the Ark be=
fore the mouse arrives" and opening a channel he said "Scourge, I need your=
 help... we are in a mission: Mouse open season... go to my location"

Perc=
eptor ran towards the poitn where Ratrap was 


From: Sandy 
Sent: Tuesday,=
 February 23, 2010 9:48 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Recover=
ing Rodimus/BlackFortress


  
Tucson reels in pain, and then realizes that=
 Nightlight is not responding to his call. She was unconcious. Again, with =
every effort he tries to make, his actions once again put a major strain on=
 his systems as his energy levels drop from sixty to forty percent. This wo=
uldn't bode well for him. He could no longer transform, he could no longer =
move without great effort. He collapses to the ground, and now hearing Scor=
ponok's steps, he remains up against a wall, burnt out, nearly broken, and =
severely drained of his resources. His shinny silver armor scuffed and dent=
ed, appearing like something out of a major car wreck. He could not go any =
further. !!

Rat Trap stands over him and stays by his side.

"Wheels, no, =
ya can't give up on me, not like this."

Tucson puts his hand with effort i=
nto Rat Traps'.

"I - may not be - able to move, but, you - still have all =
your energy reserves - in tact. Rat - Trap. I - need you to - f- find the o=
thers, Zarak mentoned the Ark.. You - must find it and - try to get help. C=
an - you do that?"

Rat Trap nodds.

" I hate leavn' ya here Wheels, but we=
're outa options. Okay, I'll do it. For you I'll risk my aft. But, how do I=
 find it? When will I know I've reached it?"

Tucson gasps for breath. He t=
hen takes off his transmitter from his helmet and turns on a beacon. The be=
acon pulses slowly on it. 

" There is a beacon on this transmitter. The fa=
ster it - pulsates, the closser you - are to finding the Ark. It was instal=
led on my helmet after I became visually impaired, so I could find my way b=
ack to the Ark after - each mission. The beacon reacts to the alloys used t=
o build the ship. And only ones used by Autobots. 

Rat Trap takes the tran=
smitter.

"But without this you're a sittn' duck. This is our ears, this is=
 how you navigate. Without this, you'll be bumpn' the walls constantly."

T=
ucson sighs.

" I can't go anywhere anyway. Now, get - going. You have a lo=
t of ground to cover."

Rat Trap nodds, while Tucson secures the transmitte=
r onto his left ear, while in his rat form. The transmitter seems rather la=
rge for his ear yet, he carries it sufficiantly.

" You can count on me Whe=
els."

He leaves his disabled friend, and darts out into the hallways in hi=
s rat form, cautiously moving and freezing in place once in open areas. The=
 transmitter blips slowly. He still had a long way to go before he could re=
ach the Ark.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Preston Carroll <supercyclonus=
@...> wrote:
>
> For the briefest of moments Zarak caught a glimpse of the =
reading on
> his scanner, and all he could see immediately that what was hi=
dden in
> Tuscon's helm was no simple rat, there was too much energy there.=

> 
> However the rat quickly transferred energy to Tuscon in the form of a=

> fuel dump, and quicker than Zarak would have thought possible Tuscon
> w=
as back in action, along with Rat Trap!
> 
> It seemed like it only took se=
conds! Rat Trap appeared, Tuscon
> revived, Darkhawk was knocked down, and =
for a moment it seemed as if
> Tuscon was going to drive right over him, bu=
t then he swerved, and
> after a blast from Rat Trap that blasted open a se=
ction of wall they
> took off down.
> 
> Zarak smiled as he sent a few shot=
s from his energy rifle down after
> the fleeing Autobot and Maximal!
> 
> =
Quickly he leaped over to where the fallen Darkhawk lay as he opened a
> co=
mmunication to Hydras and Perceptor, "The prisoner has escaped!"
> Zarak lo=
oked back over at the hole that was blown in the door as he
> spoke, "There=
 were two of them. One of them was hiding on that Tuscon
> Autobot. He some=
how freed him and they're driving through the base!"
> 
> Even as Zarak did=
 quick scan of Darkhawk to check his vitals, a deep
> thunk of metal boots =
hitting thick deck plating could be heard from
> behind him. A door slid op=
en.
> 
> After ascertaining that Darkhawk would live he stood and turned, "=
Yes
> my old friend, the time has come once again."
> 
> Taking up the enti=
re frame of the door was the massive figure of
> Scorponok, Zarak's second =
body so to speak. At the moment it was
> headless, giving it a strangely gh=
astly and yet vulnerable appearance.
> However that was easily rectified as=
 Zarak leaped into the air and
> with the tel-tale sounds of gears grinding=
 he shifted into a head, one
> that slipped perfectly between Scorponok's s=
houlders and clicked.
> 
> In his own form Zarak was short, even diminutive=
, but now joined once
> again with Scorponok he was fully head and shoulder=
s taller then most
> Maximals and Predicons! With a Decepticon purple frame=
 and powerfully
> built green limbs he radiated aggression and domminance! =
The cannons
> mounted on his shoulders and the massive claws that he had fo=
r hands
> were mute testimony to the true destructive potential that lay at=
 his
> command.
> 
> He transformed into his destructive crab mode and took=
 off after Rat
> Trap and Tuscon!
> 
> OOC: I think that Cyclonus and Scour=
ge and the rest are somewhat
> separate from all this for them not to be in=
volved, so I will post for
> them in a different letter.
> 
> Preston
> (Za=
rak-Scorponok)
